text: @DHSCgovuk @CMO_England @PHE_uk @NHSEngland @CMOWales @PublicHealthW @scotgovhealth @healthdpt @publichealthni Not actually a true reflection of how many have died of Covid19, as on the screens of tv its adding deaths of people not tested for the virus. Maybe get a truer figure and not put Covid on every death cert. I dont doubt a lot have died from it but not everyone has.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
